column4: guys i have a question ... does any one know abt a smallest possible computer system which supports both ubuntu/linux and also wifi / bluetooth ??
hi im installing windows with ubuntu and resizing the hdd .. what is the best option for windows to be set to ... a Fat32 or NTFS ?
Fat32 can be read by linux ntfs works better in linux
Fat32 is probibly good enough and it's the most veristal, not the best but the most compadible with everything so if I was you I would guess fat 32 if you don't need any files over 4 gigs
